nodes.text: Star Wars Droids: The Adventures of R2-D2 and C-3PO

Star Wars Droids: The Adventures of R2-D2 and C-3PO was a source article appearing in Polyhedron 170. It was written by Rich Handley and Abel G. Peña and illustrated by Jeffery Carlisle. The article covered the events of the Trigon One cycle of Star Wars Droids, expanding on the backstory of the characters and giving RPG statistics for characters and vehicles.
